item.title: Apr 15
item.description: Prompt: Act as if you were an artist, give me some creative but relevant ideas for my future ai art Apr 15 [!tldr] Apr 15 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize Certainly! Here are some creative and relevant ideas for your future AI art: Create a virtual world where the user can explore and interact with various digital beings. This could be an exciting world of augmented reality, in which users can see and interact with digitally generated characters that come to life in front of their eyes.
